item.description:
What is a summer without some water and boating? A little bit less I'll say.

We'll be meeting up at Louie B's on the shores of Lake Congamond. The lake is on the border of CT and Mass. Crabby Joe's is close by so we'll check that out to. Stephanie is docking her boat with us so we'll be spending some time on the water. How great is that! Thanks Stephanie!

This event is weather dependent so check back for any updates. We'll also be having this event regularly throughout the summer weekends.

Later at night Louie B's has a nightclub there so we may check that scene out.

The time is set for 12:30p.m. but people can come anytime in the afternoon. Give me a call when you arrive and I'll guide you into the group. 860-919-9782

Bring yourself and any friends that want to hang out too, all are invited.

Boating Fun, Summer Night = a Full Summer 2011.

Cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a call or text me at 860-919-9782.
item.name: Boating
